programme.title: Palimpsest
Palimpsest
programme.desc:
Palimpsest: Directed by Konrad Niewolski. With Andrzej Chyra, Magdalena Cielecka, Robert Gonera, Tomasz Sapryk. Marek, the main character of "Palimpsest," is a police inspector, a man on the verge of psychological disintegration trying to solve an intricate case. The story is told on two planes. The first one is a crime story, which constitutes the framework of the film. In the course of events, another theme appears - psychological experiences of the main character. Vivid blend of picture with sound and music will draw the audience into the deepest recesses of Marek's mind, making the viewers face questions: What is reality and what is only an illusion? Where is the borderline between the real world and our perception of it? What makes suffering meaningful and what is really important in one's life"?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0805580/","name":"Palimpsest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNDg3Njg2NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODk4NTk5Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Marek, the main character of "Palimpsest," is a police inspector, a man on the verge of psychological disintegration trying to solve an intricate case. The story is told on two planes. The first one is a crime story, which constitute","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0805580/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rayanrafay"},"dateCreated":"2006-09-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intriguing","reviewBody":"This movie is special.

It is a true in-depth study of the mind, and our individual perception's of reality. It can be confusing, and I will admit if there was not a Q&A with the director after the film ended (Toronto Film Festival) I would have given it an 8 or 9 (I failed to understand some of the symbolism). But after hearing his rationale and thought process, I am forced to give it a perfect rating.

The concept is truly intriguing and the story is ambiguous enough for individuals to draw their own conclusions.

If you are weary of common Hollywood fare, this is the perfect movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":503,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Thriller"],"datePublished":"2006-08-18","keywords":"police inspector,murder,husband wife relationship,doctor","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0161607/","name":"Andrzej Chyra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0162123/","name":"Magdalena Cielecka"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0327290/","name":"Robert Gonera"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1407454/","name":"Konrad Niewolski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067099/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023778/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076604/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0107013/","name":"Igor Brejdygant"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Zmruz oczy
Zmruż oczy
programme.desc:
Zmruz oczy: Directed by Andrzej Jakimowski. With Zbigniew Zamachowski, Olga Prószynska, Rafal Guzniczak, Malgorzata Foremniak. The story of a spirited ten-year-old girl who has run away from her proudly affluent parents in town and finds grudging refuge with the slightly slovenly caretaker of an abandoned farm, an ex-teacher." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0379063/","name":"Zmruz oczy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmZjNzhhNDYtMTg1YS00YWNjLTg0MjctNTY0Zjk1ZDEyZjk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwOTA0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of a spirited ten-year-old girl who has run away from her proudly affluent parents in town and finds grudging refuge with the slightly slovenly caretaker of an abandoned farm, an ex-teacher.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0379063/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jbig"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A review that helps to understand the movie setting","reviewBody":"'Squint your eyes' is a movie not only about a real friendship between a caretaker and a young girl but also between different characters in the movie. 

It is set in contemporary Poland, in a rural area that has seen its better times. The main character, Jasiek is a burnt out teacher from big city. He is now a caretaker at a former soviet era co-op farm. 

Many scenes refer to this post-communist era: the dilapidated police cruiser that gets stuck in mud; the old truck that should be in the museum but out of necessity is still used for transportation.

The rest of the plot deals with the question of what will happen to the girl and her former teacher.

This is a very slow moving film without any fast, shaky camera movements. You get to feel the passage of time and the heat of the summer. The colors are beautiful; they would have been even better had they used better equipment. On the other hand the low budget, forced the director to shoot all the scenes in one take. This turned out to be a blessing since every scene is well thought out.

The director, Andrzej Jakimowski just like Kieslowski takes great care of every detail. There is a scene, hard to believe at first, where the eagle flies away. It has at least two different meanings but what is amazing that something like that actually happened to the director's father.

If you like to see an uplifting, sometimes funny, sad and quirky movie and at the same time learn about the Einstein relativity theory (the scene on the bridge) you will not be disappointed."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":895,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2003-10-24","keywords":"farm,ex teacher,rural setting,unemployment,isolation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0952498/","name":"Zbigniew Zamachowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1437136/","name":"Olga Prószynska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1435653/","name":"Rafal Guzniczak"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1435889/","name":"Andrzej Jakimowski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109608/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109606/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0126437/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1435889/","name":"Andrzej Jakimowski"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Children Act
W imię dziecka
The Children Act
programme.desc: The Children Act: Directed by Richard Eyre. With Emma Thompson, Stanley Tucci, Jason Watkins, Fionn Whitehead. As her marriage crumbles, a judge must decide a case involving a teenage boy who is refusing a blood transfusion on religious principle." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6040662/","name":"The Children Act","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODUwOTk1MzI3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTI4NDE3NTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"As her marriage crumbles, a judge must decide a case involving a teenage boy who is refusing a blood transfusion on religious principle.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6040662/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Kumarh02"},"dateCreated":"2018-09-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not a 'must watch' tower","reviewBody":"The trailer really wets the appetite and if like me, you were expecting a lengthy legal battle with a dose of moral dilemma and lashings of emotion, you will be disappointed. The JW blood element is short and fleeting as the film concentrated more on the marriage problems between ET & ST, who perform fantastically as ever btw, and the wild infatuations of a confused boy. There was some misrepresentation of JW's, the Kingdom Hall didn't look like any I had ever set foot in, it painted a biased picture of people's interpretation of faith and there language and terminology felt archaic and old testamenty. There are few a divisive topics as refusing blood transfusions for minors based on religious faith and this particular showing didn't leave me or my party much to deliberate on after the credits. Overall, a missed opportunity and a waste of a fine cast.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12338,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-08-24","keywords":"female judge,husband wife relationship,teenage boy,teenager,17 year old","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2677390105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGIzYmNjOGItNWY1ZC00ZmI5LWFhMGMtZTI0OGMwYTczNmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGIzYmNjOGItNWY1ZC00ZmI5LWFhMGMtZTI0OGMwYTczNmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As her marriage to Jack (Stanley Tucci) flounders, eminent High Court judge Fiona Maye (Emma Thompson) has a life-changing decision to make at work - should she force a teenage boy, Adam (Fionn Whitehead), to have the blood transfusion that will save his life? Her unorthodox visit to his hospital bedside has a profound impact on them both, stirring strong new emotions in the boy and long-buried feelings in her."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001804/","name":"Stanley Tucci"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914327/","name":"Jason Watkins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264236/","name":"Richard Eyre"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209419/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251858/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0568605/","name":"Ian McEwan"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 6040662, Title: The Children Act, --- Description: The Children Act: Directed by Richard Eyre. With Emma Thompson, Stanley Tucci, Jason Watkins, Fionn Whitehead. As her marriage crumbles, a judge must decide a case involving a teenage boy who is refusing a blood transfusion on religious principle." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6040662/","name":"The Children Act","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODUwOTk1MzI3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTI4NDE3NTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"As her marriage crumbles, a judge must decide a case involving a teenage boy who is refusing a blood transfusion on religious principle.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6040662/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Kumarh02","dateCreated":"2018-09-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not a 'must watch' tower","reviewBody":"The trailer really wets the appetite and if like me, you were expecting a lengthy legal battle with a dose of moral dilemma and lashings of emotion, you will be disappointed. The JW blood element is short and fleeting as the film concentrated more on the marriage problems between ET & ST, who perform fantastically as ever btw, and the wild infatuations of a confused boy. There was some misrepresentation of JW's, the Kingdom Hall didn't look like any I had ever set foot in, it painted a biased picture of people's interpretation of faith and there language and terminology felt archaic and old testamenty. There are few a divisive topics as refusing blood transfusions for minors based on religious faith and this particular showing didn't leave me or my party much to deliberate on after the credits. Overall, a missed opportunity and a waste of a fine cast.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12338,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-08-24","keywords":"female judge,husband wife relationship,teenage boy,teenager,17 year old","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2677390105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGIzYmNjOGItNWY1ZC00ZmI5LWFhMGMtZTI0OGMwYTczNmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGIzYmNjOGItNWY1ZC00ZmI5LWFhMGMtZTI0OGMwYTczNmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As her marriage to Jack (Stanley Tucci) flounders, eminent High Court judge Fiona Maye (Emma Thompson) has a life-changing decision to make at work - should she force a teenage boy, Adam (Fionn Whitehead), to have the blood transfusion that will save his life? programme.title: Life in a Year
Rok na całe życie
Life In A Year
programme.desc:
Life in a Year: Directed by Mitja Okorn. With Jaden Smith, Cara Delevingne, Cuba Gooding Jr., Chris D'Elia. The movie follows 17-year-old Daryn who finds out that his girlfriend is dying. He sets out to give her an entire life in the last year she has left." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6598238/","name":"Life in a Year","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTNiY2Y4MjMtM2MyMi00ODYxLTk4N2MtNjhkYjVkODFjNmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDg0MDgxNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The movie follows 17-year-old Daryn who finds out that his girlfriend is dying. He sets out to give her an entire life in the last year she has left.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6598238/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TxMike"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Retread teen issues, see it if it is free.","reviewBody":"Beware, there are several "10" reviews by people who just recently have established their accounts, most likely studio shills to get the rating up. This is becoming more and more routine on the IMDb. You'd best ignore them.

My greatest disappointment with this film is casting Jaden Smith as the boyfriend. If you do a search on the terms "can't act" you might well get a photo of Jaden Smith. He drags the movie down.

A few years ago he was featured in "After Earth" with his dad, on that role I wrote, "This is a very plain story, and relies on young Jaden Smith to convince us he can carry an action movie. He showed us he can't. He is not a good actor, and he enunciates so poorly that we often had difficulty even understanding what he said."

Other than that it is a decent story, although told many times before, and Cara Delevingne is really good in a challenging role. See the movie if you will, just don't expect too much. It is available FREE on Amazon so you are only out a bit of your time."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7098,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-12-16","keywords":"girlfriend,blue green hair,pink hair","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi456704281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc3YmViMGYtYjgyNi00NDg2LTk2MTEtNDVmOTI4ODQ2MzRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc3YmViMGYtYjgyNi00NDg2LTk2MTEtNDVmOTI4ODQ2MzRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"The movie follows 17-year-old Daryn who finds out that his girlfriend is dying. He sets out to give her an entire life in the last year she has left."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1535523/","name":"Jaden Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5353321/","name":"Cara Delevingne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000421/","name":"Cuba Gooding Jr."}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1840911/","name":"Mitja Okorn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0072775/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2731620/","name":"Jeffrey Addiss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2176993/","name":"Will Matthews"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

Ophelia
programme.desc: Ophelia: Directed by Claire McCarthy. With Daisy Ridley, Mia Quiney, Calum O'Rourke, Nathaniel Parker. A reimagining of Hamlet, told from Ophelia's perspective." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5690810/","name":"Ophelia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU2OTAxNjI2OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzc2NjUwODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A reimagining of Hamlet, told from Ophelia's perspective.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5690810/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"anczykowska"},"dateCreated":"2019-07-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Disappointed with acting","reviewBody":"Characters act like it's happening in 21st century: winking, rolling eyes at each other, etc. Ruins the authenticity of the period of time its based in.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9581,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-06-28","keywords":"shakespeare's hamlet,gertrude character,ophelia character,title directed by female,denmark","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3975527449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWQ4NmM0ODQtMDZkNS00NTYwLTgzNzQtMzBmZjVkY2FiM2I2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWQ4NmM0ODQtMDZkNS00NTYwLTgzNzQtMzBmZjVkY2FiM2I2XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in the 14th Century, 'Ophelia' is a re-imagining of Shakespeare's "Hamlet." Ophelia (Daisy Ridley) takes center stage as Queen Gertrude's (Naomi Watts) most trusted lady-in-waiting. Beautiful and intelligent, she soon captures the attention of the handsome Prince Hamlet (George MacKay) and a forbidden love blossoms. As war brews, lust and betrayal are tearing Elsinore Castle apart from within and Ophelia must decide between her true love or her own life in order to protect a very dangerous secret."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5397459/","name":"Daisy Ridley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6731603/","name":"Mia Quiney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9058955/","name":"Calum O'Rourke"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2113122/","name":"Claire McCarthy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0551691/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0207528/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0457787/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0155069/","name":"Semi Chellas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8120239/","name":"Lisa Klein"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000636/","name":"William Shakespeare"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

As war brews, lust and betrayal are tearing Elsinore Castle apart from within and Ophelia must decide between her true love or her own life in order to protect a very dangerous secret.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5397459/","name":"Daisy Ridley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6731603/","name":"Mia Quiney","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9058955/","name":"Calum O'Rourke"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2113122/","name":"Claire McCarthy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0551691/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0207528/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0457787/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0155069/","name":"Semi Chellas","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8120239/","name":"Lisa Klein","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000636/","name":"William Shakespeare"],"duration":"PT1H54M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Echo Boomers
Echo Boomers
programme.desc: Echo Boomers: Directed by Seth Savoy. With Michael Shannon, Patrick Schwarzenegger, Alex Pettyfer, Hayley Law. Based on a true story, five college graduates decide the best way to get back at the unfair economy and live the life they've always wanted is to steal from Chicago's richest and give to themselves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4353270/","name":"Echo Boomers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGRiYzEyMmMtMjgwNy00MzE0LWE4M2UtZDFlMzQ0MWVjNWNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQwMTY2Nzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on a true story, five college graduates decide the best way to get back at the unfair economy and live the life they've always wanted is to steal from Chicago's richest and give to themselves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4353270/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stevedudesp"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ok BUT, PEOPLE MISUNDERSTAND INEQUALITY.","reviewBody":"Inequality in Humans, is sadly necessary. Equality of opportunity is difficult to achieve, but it is (in my belief) a worthy goal. Equality of outcome is impossible to achieve without reducing everyone to the level of the least successful person. Equality of misery is all that will be achieved in this manner. Inequality is a necessary part of life. Why is inequality important? While the thought of inequality may cause us some emotional discomfort, it is true. How would you make a professional athlete and a couch potato equal in sports? You can only try to pull the athlete down to the level of the weakest person. This is the basis of the Kurt Vonnegut short story "Harrison Bergeron". Even the cursory synopsis on the Wikipedia page can make you revile the idea of forcing everyone down to the same level, just to make them all equal. The worst form of inequality is to try to make unequal things equal. - Aristotle Taken from online article, but when looked at with Common sense, sadly it's absolutely true. This movie just shows the true behaviour of those that don't have, feeling entitled to take or distroy the property of those that have. Don't misunderstand here, I'm someone that Doesn't have, but I can apply common sense and decency.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7929,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-11-13","keywords":"college","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi949666073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDIxYjdiMDEtY2ZlYy00ZjFjLTljZDctN2JhMDJiMmZhNjE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDIxYjdiMDEtY2ZlYy00ZjFjLTljZDctN2JhMDJiMmZhNjE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two-time Academy Award® nominee Michael Shannon (Knives Out) stars in this gripping crime-thriller filled with pulse-pounding twists and turns. A recent college graduate Lance Zutterland (Patrick Schwarzenegger) leaves school in debt, realizing everything he had worked towards was built on a lie. When he is pulled into a criminal underground operation, he finds his peers fighting the system by stealing from the rich and giving to... themselves. With nothing to lose, they leave behind a trail of destruction but with the cops closing in, tensions mount and Lance soon discovers he is in over his head with no way out."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0788335/","name":"Michael Shannon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2200639/","name":"Patrick Schwarzenegger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1641117/","name":"Alex Pettyfer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4395296/","name":"Seth Savoy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0034240/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0741272/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0304911/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0076791/","name":"Kevin Bernhardt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3575126/","name":"Jason Miller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4395296/","name":"Seth Savoy"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Hell Fest: Directed by Gregory Plotkin. With Cynthea Mercado, Stephen Conroy, Amy Forsyth, Reign Edwards. A masked serial killer turns a horror-themed amusement park into his own personal playground, terrorizing a group of friends while the rest of the patrons believe that it is all part of the show." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1999890/","name":"Hell Fest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzg2MTNjOGUtZDk3OS00OGJkLWIyZWYtZGQxMmI5MTRkNzcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODAzODU1NDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A masked serial killer turns a horror-themed amusement park into his own personal playground, terrorizing a group of friends while the rest of the patrons believe that it is all part of the show.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1999890/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mariob-47307"},"dateCreated":"2018-09-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Could have done better","reviewBody":"Here's a movie with endless potential with an ability to scare the crap out of you. programme.title: Pornografia
Pornografia
programme.desc:
Pornografia: Directed by Jan Jakub Kolski. With Krzysztof Majchrzak, Adam Ferency, Krzysztof Globisz, Grazyna Blecka-Kolska. Two intellectuals, a writer and a director, begin to play a mysterious psychological game in a peaceful countryside manor house during the Nazi occupation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0357037/","name":"Pornografia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyNTY3ODE2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODMwNTQ4Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two intellectuals, a writer and a director, begin to play a mysterious psychological game in a peaceful countryside manor house during the Nazi occupation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0357037/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Mengedegna"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Spielberg should sue","reviewBody":"What on earth could have possessed the NY Film Festival selection committee to inflict this pretentious, boring, derivative, ugly and silly piece of third-rate filmmaking on its audience? Because it's Polish and we haven't had a lot of worthwhile Polish movies since Kieslowski? Has it come to that?

The film takes Witold Gombrowicz's long-winded but intermittently fascinating classic novel and superimposes a gratuitous (and fatuous) Spielbergesque holocaust plot line, to make it all, I guess, more compelling. The effect is glaringly contrived and (as with the far better Spielberg original) offensively trivializing.

In case anyone misses the point, the holocaust plot overlay involves a doomed little girl and, at the dénouement, a shift to a black-and-white background against which is displayed, in color, a talismanic link to her. Sound familiar? Spielberg should sue.

The sad thing is that there is some talent at work here. Though the plot is gratuitously confusing, meandering, and contrived, the use of a country house around which a low-intensity conflict between Germans and Polish partisans swirls obliquely is effective, with the fighting intruding suddenly into and then just as suddenly vanishing from the playing out of the protagonists' humdrum idleness and self-absorption. Grayzna Blecka-Kolska gives a performance that almost transcends the clichés written into her role as the quietly tipsy châtelaine, and the two young people who are the objects of the middle-aged protagonists' dirty-old-man obsessions (Gombrowicz's central plot line, if no longer Kolski's) look as if they might have been far more effectively used in some other movie, one in which they were given something to do beyond standing around and looking beautiful (which they are, it should be said). But on the whole, this is an over-the-top, pretentious dud, the sort of thing that should be seen only by the paid critics who then have a professional obligation and civic duty to spare all the rest of us such an irritating waste of our time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":937,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Romance","War"],"datePublished":"2003-10-17","keywords":"sex standing up,lift skirt,panties hit the floor,panties pulled down,fondling","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0538048/","name":"Krzysztof Majchrzak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272295/","name":"Adam Ferency"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322937/","name":"Krzysztof Globisz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464383/","name":"Jan Jakub Kolski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043688/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090290/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0094194/","name":"Luc Bondy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0102722/","name":"Gérard Brach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0326822/","name":"Witold Gombrowicz"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

Where could this movie go wrong?","reviewBody":"The East: an environmentalist group following the philosophy of an eye for an eye. The movie follows Sarah, an agent trying to infiltrate The East. The movie was almost always exciting, but showed more of the emotional side of the characters.\n\nI had a lot of fun with this one. At times I found myself holding my breath, and couldn't figure out why. The movie had a good flow to it, with enough exciting parts to keep you from falling asleep. My biggest complaint with the movie is it didn't go as deep into the emotional sides of things and felt like it wanted to be more of a mainstream movie because of it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":49604,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-06-28","keywords":"anarchist,ecoterrorism,environmental crime,nude swimming,male nudity","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2067179033","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMzg2NjU0OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODYzNzM0OQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMzg2NjU0OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODYzNzM0OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An operative for an elite private intelligence firm finds her priorities irrevocably changed after she is tasked with infiltrating an anarchist group known for executing covert attacks upon major corporations. programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: 10 giorni senza mamma
Sami bez mamy
10 giorni senza mamma
programme.desc: 10 giorni senza mamma: Directed by Alessandro Genovesi. With Fabio De Luigi, Valentina Lodovini, Angelica Elli, Bianca Usai. What happens if an always present mother decides to leave for ten days, leaving the three children with a father who was practically absent until then." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8660788/","name":"10 giorni senza mamma","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzUzMzhkMGYtOTU1Ni00Y2UzLWJkOTktMjg3ZWFjM2ExOTM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQ4MDQ4ODc@._V1_.jpg","description":"What happens if an always present mother decides to leave for ten days, leaving the three children with a father who was practically absent until then.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8660788/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"avillamaina"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Usual stereotypes, moderate humour","reviewBody":"This movie builds on the nowadays common stereotypes where mothers don't have a job in spite of being truly brilliant, being able to steer through a myriad of daily chores and activities with kids while working fathers are completely useless, showing that they would never cope with switching roles, not even for 10 days. programme.title: The New Mutants
Nowi mutanci
The New Mutants
programme.desc:
The New Mutants: Directed by Josh Boone. With Maisie Williams, Anya Taylor-Joy, Charlie Heaton, Alice Braga. Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4682266/","name":"The New Mutants","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQ2NTdmNDgtMGIwMS00ODE2LTk5M2EtZGZhYzc4MWRlNTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc4MjczMTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4682266/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"user-46-247014"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bad Writing","reviewBody":"No amount of acting and effects can make up for terrible writing. Lets just say they set up certain things in the movie and then never use them. You're like, oh the beginning of the movie said this, but don't expect anything to happen because... bad writing.

It really peaks near the beginning, then really drags on. Theres a fight scene near the end that is endless, unbelievable, really repetitive. The climax is anticlimactic so....

There was potential for a good movie, and the actors did fine, but the characters didn't act like real people. It was so obvious what was going on but they dragged on every single story element and repeated it. I feel bad for these actors; Truly a waste of money and talent.

Part of the reason it was so bad is because it has an intellectual level of Spy Kids, super predictable and stereotypical moments but placed and set up so poorly that they have no emotional depth. It checks all the boxes except being interesting and having a good plot... you know... like missing the whole point of movies.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":67203,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2020-08-28","keywords":"mutant,based on comic book,marvel comics,x men,superheroine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Comic-Con Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1041219097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmIyNDQxZDgtNTY0NS00ZDcxLTkwNDgtYjQ1ZGI0NGU2ODcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmIyNDQxZDgtNTY0NS00ZDcxLTkwNDgtYjQ1ZGI0NGU2ODcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Twentieth Century Studios in association with Marvel Entertainment presents The New Mutants, an original horror thriller set in an isolated hospital where a group of young mutants is being held for psychiatric monitoring. When strange occurrences begin to take place, both their new mutant abilities and their friendships will be tested as they battle to try and make it out alive. Directed by Josh Boone (The Fault in our Stars) and written by Josh Boone & Knate Lee, The New Mutants stars: Maisie Williams (Game of Thrones); Anya Taylor-Joy (Glass); Charlie Heaton (Stranger Things); Alice Braga (Predators); Blu Hunt (The Originals); and Henry Zaga (13 Reasons Why). The film is produced by Simon Kinberg, p.g.a., Karen Rosenfelt and Lauren Shuler Donner with Stan Lee and Michele Imperato Stabile serving as executive producers."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3586035/","name":"Maisie Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6390427/","name":"Charlie Heaton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0781821/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1029878/","name":"Knate Lee"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: One of a Kind Love
One of a Kind Love
programme.desc:
One of a Kind Love: Directed by Philippe Lupien. With Jocelyn Hudon, Jake Manley, Daniela Sandiford, Raphael Grosz-Harvey. Kyra's dreams of being a jeweler have been put on the backburner, as her demanding job at the Sawyer Country Club is her priority. When a vacant shop becomes available in town, Kyra sees an opportunity to put a plan into action, until she learns that there's another renter interested in the space. Enter Aiden Sawyer, prodigal son, big-city business magnate and Kyra's childhood nemesis, returning home to the country club his parents own. As they patch up their past, Kyra and Aiden learn that there may be something more between them than just playful flirting. But when Kyra enters a renowned jewelry contest to raise enough money to outbid the mystery renter, Aiden finds himself in a race against time to make everything right." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt13012364/","name":"One of a Kind Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGY4MWQwNTEtOTEzMC00NDdjLWIwMTItMzcyZDhiMWNiM2JmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk1NzUwMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Kyra's dreams of being a jeweler have been put on the backburner, as her demanding job at the Sawyer Country Club is her priority. The only thing i didn't like was the jewelry!!! programme.title: The Nest
Gniazdo zła
Il nido
programme.desc:
The Nest (Il nido): Directed by Roberto De Feo. With Francesca Cavallin, Ginevra Francesconi, Justin Korovkin, Maurizio Lombardi. Samuel is a paraplegic boy who lives with his mother Elena in an isolated mansion. When he meets Denise, he finds the strength to open up to the world. Elena won't let him go so easily, and she is ready to do whatever it takes to stop him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4925340/","name":"The Nest (Il nido)","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgyZTQ2NTctMzczZC00OGE5LWE3ZTUtYWJkMjAzMTQ0MWQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIwNDY4NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Samuel is a paraplegic boy who lives with his mother Elena in an isolated mansion. When he meets Denise, he finds the strength to open up to the world. Elena won't let him go so easily, and she is ready to do whatever it takes to sto","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4925340/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"andrealeonti"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"De Feo's "The Nest" may represent the rebirth of a long forgotten genre like the italian horror","reviewBody":"Let's be clear: horror is a genre that in Italy has been forgotten for about 20-25 years. After ancient glories and masterpieces signed by worldwide-acclaimed masters such as Argento, Fulci, Avati and Bava, horror cinema seems to have totally disappeared from national screens.

Roberto De Feo's "The Nest" is the breath of rebirth and resurrection of a long forgotten genre. The Nest is a horror that does not point to fear or disgust with particular visual artifices, but adheres to a more suspended, obscure and implicit line like Robert Eggers' "The Witch". Except for two or three visually more decisive and explicit sequences (placed however in a timely manner and not inopportune) it is a film that is based on dark atmospheres, on a sense of anguish and on a feeling that something strange is about to occur. It is a horror that also presents very delicate sequences, not trivial and well cohesive with the rest of the work. A fairly predictable end, however, if one takes into account the clues given here and there in the film and the narrative evolution of the story. An ending that presents nothing innovative, but well cohesive with the premise built by the film.

On a technical level, it presents a really beautiful and extremely accurate photography, moreover being a horror, and an Italian horror. From the directorial style it would be very plausible to believe that it is an Anglo-Saxon or American production. De Feo's direction is obscure, punctual, precise, elegant, enveloping but also sufficiently detached. Actorial evidence is positive on the whole, except for some high and low of some actors.

The Nest could be the rebirth of a new wave of Italian horror, and I sincerely hope that it is not a beacon of darkness destined, inexorably, to go out to make a long-forgotten genre return to oblivion.

programme.review: --- Actors: Francesca Cavallin (role=Elena), Ginevra Francesconi (role=Denise), Justin Korovkin (role=Samuel), Maurizio Lombardi (role=Christian), Fabrizio Odetto (role=Filippo), Troy James (role=Aura), Elia Francesco Barbero (role=Samuel a 3 anni)

IMDb data; ttnr: 4925340, Title: The Nest, --- Description: The Nest (Il nido): Directed by Roberto De Feo. With Francesca Cavallin, Ginevra Francesconi, Justin Korovkin, Maurizio Lombardi. Samuel is a paraplegic boy who lives with his mother Elena in an isolated mansion. When he meets Denise, he finds the strength to open up to the world. Elena won't let him go so easily, and she is ready to do whatever it takes to stop him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4925340/","name":"The Nest (Il nido)","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgyZTQ2NTctMzczZC00OGE5LWE3ZTUtYWJkMjAzMTQ0MWQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIwNDY4NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Samuel is a paraplegic boy who lives with his mother Elena in an isolated mansion. When he meets Denise, he finds the strength to open up to the world. Elena won't let him go so easily, and she is ready to do whatever it takes to sto","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4925340/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"andrealeonti","dateCreated":"2019-08-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"De Feo's "The Nest" may represent the rebirth of a long forgotten genre like the italian horror","reviewBody":"Let's be clear: horror is a genre that in Italy has been forgotten for about 20-25 years. After ancient glories and masterpieces signed by worldwide-acclaimed masters such as Argento, Fulci, Avati and Bava, horror cinema seems to have totally disappeared from national screens.

Roberto De Feo's "The Nest" is the breath of rebirth and resurrection of a long forgotten genre. The Nest is a horror that does not point to fear or disgust with particular visual artifices, but adheres to a more suspended, obscure and implicit line like Robert Eggers' "The Witch". Except for two or three visually more decisive and explicit sequences (placed however in a timely manner and not inopportune) it is a film that is based on dark atmospheres, on a sense of anguish and on a feeling that something strange is about to occur. It is a horror that also presents very delicate sequences, not trivial and well cohesive with the rest of the work. A fairly predictable end, however, if one takes into account the clues given here and there in the film and the narrative evolution of the story. An ending that presents nothing innovative, but well cohesive with the premise built by the film.

On a technical level, it presents a really beautiful and extremely accurate photography, moreover being a horror, and an Italian horror. From the directorial style it would be very plausible to believe that it is an Anglo-Saxon or American production. De Feo's direction is obscure, punctual, precise, elegant, enveloping but also sufficiently detached. Actorial evidence is positive on the whole, except for some high and low of some actors.

The Nest could be the rebirth of a new wave of Italian horror, and I sincerely hope that it is not a beacon of darkness destined, inexorably, to go out to make a long-forgotten genre return to oblivion.

Die Hard: With a Vengeance
programme.desc:
Die Hard: Directed by John McTiernan. With Bruce Willis, Bonnie Bedelia, Reginald VelJohnson, Paul Gleason. An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0095016/","name":"Die Hard","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjRlNDUxZjAtOGQ4OC00OTNlLTgxNmQtYTBmMDgwZmNmNjkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0095016/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cherold"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Classic action movie","reviewBody":"I first saw this movie a thousand years ago, but have been meaning to rewatch it since I started reading the debates on whether it can be considered a Christmas movie. But every Christmas when I suggested it to my girlfriend she would reply, "maybe later."

And then, after several years, we watched it. And while she's not always a big action-movie person, she loved it. The story is engaging. Bruce Willis has a way with a snappy line. The movie is full of snappy lines. It's exciting.

Some elements don't make any sense. It's certainly pure nonsense. And while it may technically have the features of a Christmas movie, it sure ain't Christmasy. But it is lots of fun and if you haven't seen it you really should. Even if it's not Christmas.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":823168,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1988-07-20","keywords":"hostage,one against many,los angeles california,christmas,heist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer: 30th Anniversary Christmas Edition","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3895704089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDViZDAzMjAtY2E1YS00OThkLWE2YTMtYzBmYWRjMWY0MDhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDViZDAzMjAtY2E1YS00OThkLWE2YTMtYzBmYWRjMWY0MDhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"Bruce Willis is John McClane in the film that launched the billion-dollar 'Die Hard' action franchise."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000614/","name":"Alan Rickman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000889/","name":"Bonnie Bedelia"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001532/","name":"John McTiernan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119038/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019968/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0861636/","name":"Roderick Thorp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0835732/","name":"Jeb Stuart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0211823/","name":"Steven E. de Souza"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
Conan Barbarzyńca
Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc:
Conan the Barbarian: Directed by John Milius. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, James Earl Jones, Max von Sydow, Sandahl Bergman. A young boy, Conan, becomes a slave after his parents are killed and tribe destroyed by a savage warlord and sorcerer, Thulsa Doom. When he grows up he becomes a fearless, invincible fighter. Set free, he plots revenge against Thulsa Doom." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0082198/","name":"Conan the Barbarian","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWIxMzQxZjAtMGFkNC00NzYwLWFiMGEtNzZhZjE5MmFiMmMyL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young boy, Conan, becomes a slave after his parents are killed and tribe destroyed by a savage warlord and sorcerer, Thulsa Doom. When he grows up he becomes a fearless, invincible fighter. Set free, he plots revenge against Thulsa","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0082198/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ottox"},"dateCreated":"2003-05-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Simply Brilliant","reviewBody":"This is one of my top-ten favorite movies of all time. It's quite easy to dismiss this film based on its genre (barbarian slash-em-up) and the limited acting ability of the star (Schwarzenegger), but Conan is nothing short of a masterpiece.

Ok, the story is fairly standard, and the principal actors (Schwarzenegger, Sandahl Bergman & Gerry Lopez) are competent but not outstanding. There are a few brief but memorable performances from James Earl Jones and Max von Sydow that help lend weight to the film, but the real stars are Poledouris' score and the cinematography. I have never seen a more beautifully-shot film in my life. The costumes, props and art direction are all top-notch. They could take all of the dialog out of the movie, and just have the music and pictures and it would still be worth watching.

To fully appreciate Conan, though, you have to watch it and then watch another barbarian-type film from any era (Beastmaster, Krull, etc.) and the difference will be stunning."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":143123,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1982-04-15","keywords":"evil sorcerer,cult,warlord,cult film,eating human flesh","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi488422937","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmFlYzYwNTMtZmIzYi00MWZhLTgwYjMtM2I2ODllMDc5OTI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmFlYzYwNTMtZmIzYi00MWZhLTgwYjMtM2I2ODllMDc5OTI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000216/","name":"Arnold Schwarzenegger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000469/","name":"James Earl Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001884/","name":"Max von Sydow"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0587518/","name":"John Milius"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014380/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0006728/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0397574/","name":"Robert E. programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: Keeping Faith
Keeping Faith
Zaczęło się w środę
Keeping Faith
programme.desc:
Keeping Faith: Created by Matthew Hall. With Eve Myles, Bradley Freegard, Mark Lewis Jones, Hannah Daniel. Faith, a small-town Welsh lawyer, is forced to cut short her extended maternity leave when her husband and business partner, Evan, goes missing. As the truth of his actions surface, Faith must fight to protect her family and her sanity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6658720/","name":"Keeping Faith","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQzMDMyMzItMTg2MS00NmFiLThhZGMtNzhiZGIzNjE3NWE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQ5NTYyOTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Faith, a small-town Welsh lawyer, is forced to cut short her extended maternity leave when her husband and business partner, Evan, goes missing. As the truth of his actions surface, Faith must fight to protect her family and her sani","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6658720/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sleepin_Dragon"},"dateCreated":"2018-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's compulsive, gripping, engaging viewing.","reviewBody":"Keeping Faith is another gem of a drama to come from BBC Wales, and I'm so glad to see it's finally getting a full BBC1 transmission, as people need to see this.

The story is brilliant, and the eight part format allows it to develop, and develop it does, the middle episodes are so different to the opener, with the final two parts even more dramatic and intriguing.

The acting is fantastic throughout, with Eve Myles showing what a superb talent she is. Mark Lewis Jones, Eiry Thomas and Matthew Gravelle all impress also, in fairness the whole cast do an incredible job.

Superb production values, it looks and sounds fantastic throughout, Amy Wadge provides some superb vocals. The Welsh setting looks incredible, so picturesque.

All in all I'd say it's quite easy to follow, at no time did it being confusing or too deep, they've left plenty of questions that need answering, and I'm delighted to hear that a second series is in the pipeline.

Bravo all involved. 10/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4634,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-02-13","keywords":"fight","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0616990/","name":"Eve Myles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1164626/","name":"Bradley Freegard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428765/","name":"Mark Lewis Jones"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0453072/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0595504/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0453072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355888/","name":"Matthew Hall"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Keeping Faith: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2957948953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWZjYmQ3OGItZDEyMS00YzVkLWIwMzctODlmYWU0NWExMmZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWZjYmQ3OGItZDEyMS00YzVkLWIwMzctODlmYWU0NWExMmZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Transplant: Created by Joseph Kay. With Laurence Leboeuf, Hamza Haq, Ayisha Issa, Jim Watson. An ER doctor, who fled his native Syria to come to Canada, must overcome numerous obstacles to resume a career in the high stakes world of emergency medicine." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10936342/","name":"Transplant","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGRlYWY0ODctODRhZC00Nzg3LWEzYzUtOTFlNDg5N2RkMDc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjk1NTYzMDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ER doctor, who fled his native Syria to come to Canada, must overcome numerous obstacles to resume a career in the high stakes world of emergency medicine.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10936342/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sheva030"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dudes, please dont blow this one","reviewBody":"So far its OK, for a "pilot" awesome even... The path is obvious - a little bit of PC for the refugees, suspicious law enforcement lurking around the corner, a frendly college or maybe even a suspiciously nice competition - all understandable. If the story keeps the employe drama on a DL, and crank up the medical aspect of the show - it can actually be a welcome refreshment from all the same old med/dramas that we are swapt with.... A Good Day to Die Hard
programme.desc: A Good Day to Die Hard: Directed by John Moore. With Bruce Willis, Jai Courtney, Sebastian Koch, Mary Elizabeth Winstead. John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1606378/","name":"A Good Day to Die Hard","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzgyNzUzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzAwOTA5OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1606378/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"heil_cf2"},"dateCreated":"2013-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Shaky Camera ruined it for me","reviewBody":"I love Die Hard, but shaky camera ruined it for me this time. I can't see because 35% film use shaky camera, 25% out of focus, blurry and 10% rapid zoom ins. Please STOP using Shaky Camera in Films, PLEASE :I am some of those remaining species, who go to watch feature films in cinemas. I never download a movie for free, I pay to netflix. Just doing my part to save the cinema I love. But, some directors and movie making houses, make stupid moves. One of them is use of unwanted, un-needed, shaky camera. So, I want to get my voice heard. If you are a fan, go see the movie, but if you don't like Shaky Camera, then think twice.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":202750,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-02-14","keywords":"john mcclane character,repeat sequel,subjective camera,john f. kennedy international airport,taxi","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1541121817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4OTExMjg4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzUyMzE5OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4OTExMjg4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzUyMzE5OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working to prevent a nuclear-weapons heist, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces. programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: Keeping Faith
Keeping Faith
Zaczęło się w środę
Keeping Faith
programme.desc:
Keeping Faith: Created by Matthew Hall. With Eve Myles, Bradley Freegard, Mark Lewis Jones, Hannah Daniel. Faith, a small-town Welsh lawyer, is forced to cut short her extended maternity leave when her husband and business partner, Evan, goes missing. As the truth of his actions surface, Faith must fight to protect her family and her sanity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6658720/","name":"Keeping Faith","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQzMDMyMzItMTg2MS00NmFiLThhZGMtNzhiZGIzNjE3NWE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQ5NTYyOTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Faith, a small-town Welsh lawyer, is forced to cut short her extended maternity leave when her husband and business partner, Evan, goes missing. As the truth of his actions surface, Faith must fight to protect her family and her sani","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6658720/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sleepin_Dragon"},"dateCreated":"2018-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's compulsive, gripping, engaging viewing.","reviewBody":"Keeping Faith is another gem of a drama to come from BBC Wales, and I'm so glad to see it's finally getting a full BBC1 transmission, as people need to see this.

The story is brilliant, and the eight part format allows it to develop, and develop it does, the middle episodes are so different to the opener, with the final two parts even more dramatic and intriguing.

The acting is fantastic throughout, with Eve Myles showing what a superb talent she is. Mark Lewis Jones, Eiry Thomas and Matthew Gravelle all impress also, in fairness the whole cast do an incredible job.

Superb production values, it looks and sounds fantastic throughout, Amy Wadge provides some superb vocals. The Welsh setting looks incredible, so picturesque.

All in all I'd say it's quite easy to follow, at no time did it being confusing or too deep, they've left plenty of questions that need answering, and I'm delighted to hear that a second series is in the pipeline.

Bravo all involved. 10/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4634,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-02-13","keywords":"fight","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0616990/","name":"Eve Myles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1164626/","name":"Bradley Freegard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428765/","name":"Mark Lewis Jones"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0453072/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0595504/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0453072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355888/","name":"Matthew Hall"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Keeping Faith: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2957948953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWZjYmQ3OGItZDEyMS00YzVkLWIwMzctODlmYWU0NWExMmZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWZjYmQ3OGItZDEyMS00YzVkLWIwMzctODlmYWU0NWExMmZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Listy do więzienia
The Letter Room
programme.desc: Dobroduszny, ale samotny Richard (Oscar Isaac) zostaje dyrektorem więzienia. Teraz musi przeglądać całą korespondencję osadzonych. Czytając ich listy, zaczyna bliżej poznawać prywatne sprawy podopiecznych. Interesuje się zwłaszcza skazańcem znajdującym się w celi śmierci. Postanawia podjąć działania, które wydają mu się słuszne.

programme.title: Łapu-capu
programme.desc: Najśmieszniejsze fragmenty z programów polskich stacji telewizyjnych: gafy popełniane przez prezenterów, ich nietypowe zachowania przed kamerą oraz awarie techniczne powodujące absurdalne sytuacje.

programme.title: Water for Elephants
Woda dla słoni
Water for Elephants
programme.desc:
Water for Elephants: Directed by Francis Lawrence. With Reese Witherspoon, Robert Pattinson, Christoph Waltz, Paul Schneider. Set in the 1930s, a former veterinary student takes a job in a travelling circus and falls in love with the ringmaster's wife." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1067583/","name":"Water for Elephants","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzMDU3NDEwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTI3MDU0NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in the 1930s, a former veterinary student takes a job in a travelling circus and falls in love with the ringmaster's wife.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1067583/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"GlimmerBunny"},"dateCreated":"2011-04-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A truly spectacular movie!","reviewBody":"OK, I'll try to tell you a bit of what I thought about "Water for Elephants", without spoiling anything. I have not read the novel (even though I plan to do it now) so I'm only offering my views on the movie.

First of all: It's amazingly beautiful. The costumes and sets are gorgeous, the cinematography is exquisite, the animals are cute (especially Rosie the elephant) and the three leads are very easy on the eyes as well. 

Robert Pattinson was actually quite good. This was a surprise to me, since I didn't really think he was anything special in any of the Twilight movies or "Remember Me". He looked very appropriate for the time the movie was set in, and even though I love Emile Hirsch (who auditioned for Jacob too) I'm confident that Robert was the best choice there was for this role, it was perfect for him. Hal Holbrook was also very fitting for the role of older Jacob. The two actors really made me believe that they were the same person in different stages of his life.

Reese Witherspoon was okay. She looked beautiful, was charming and cute but it felt like something was missing - however, I can't think of any other actress I would have liked better in the role, so I came to the conclusion that it was probably the character Marlena that was a little bland, not Reese. 

But the true star of this movie was Christoph Waltz. I may be a bit biased since I loved him in "Inglorious Basterds", but he was even more perfect in this movie. His portrayal of August was amazing, he made him likable and interesting and I was always compelled by his scenes. The character reminded me a lot of Miles in "King Kong" (played by Jack Black), a character that also wanted fame and success more than anything and used questionable and even cruel methods to get it. He was terrifying in some scenes too, but always believable. Also, in the beginning of the movie i really felt the chemistry between August and Marlena, which made the character even more interesting; however, I did feel like Jacob and Marlena had chemistry too, and in my opinion this way it was more realistic (both men loved her and she also cared about both of them). 

I loved the movie, and I really recommend it to everyone. I would sincerely give it 10/10 stars. Of course there was some parts of the movie I didn't like (particularly towards the end of it), but overall it was a magical, spectacular and epic period movie, and I can't wait to see it again!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":113964,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-04-22","keywords":"animal abuse,circus,elephant,ringmaster,train","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2: Water for Elephants","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1397594649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MzA4MjYxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc1NTYzNTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MzA4MjYxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc1NTYzNTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veterinary student (Robert Pattinson) abandons his studies after his parents are killed and joins a traveling circus as their vet, where he meets animal trainer August (Christoph Waltz) and his wife Marlena (Reese Witherspoon)."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500155/","name":"Robert Pattinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000702/","name":"Reese Witherspoon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910607/","name":"Christoph Waltz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1349376/","name":"Francis Lawrence"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0177280/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481418/","name":"Richard LaGravenese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2717485/","name":"Sara Gruen"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

First of all: It's amazingly beautiful. The costumes and sets are gorgeous, the cinematography is exquisite, the animals are cute (especially Rosie the elephant) and the three leads are very easy on the eyes as well.

I loved the movie, and I really recommend it to everyone. I would sincerely give it 10/10 stars. programme.title: Tenis: Turniej WTA w Moskwie
programme.desc: Program w całości poświęcony rozgrywkom ligi hiszpańskiej. Widzowie będą mogli zobaczyć obszerne skróty wszystkich meczów minionego weekendu oraz bramki. Program nie ma komentarza, jest prezentowany z naturalnym dźwiękiem pochodzącym ze stadionów.

programme.title: La Liga

programme.title: Wyzwanie - nowe mieszkanie 14
programme.desc: Prowadzący Damian Urbańczyk będzie szukał idealnego lokum dla osób o rozmaitych wymaganiach i budżetach. Pojawią się m.in. niedrogie mieszkania w blokach z wielkiej płyty, apartamenty w nowych inwestycjach czy luksusowy dom pod Warszawą za kilka milionów złotych. Widzowie zobaczą, co oferuje polski rynek nieruchomości. Poznają też kolejne praktyczne porady.

programme.title: Szklana pułapka
Die Hard
programme.desc: Policjant John McClane (Bruce Willis) leci z Nowego Jorku do Los Angeles, by spotkać się ze swoją żoną, Holly (Bonnie Bedelia) i spędzić z nią Boże Narodzenie. Udaje się do firmy, w której pracuje kobieta. Siedziba przedsiębiorstwa znajduje się w 34-piętrowym wieżowcu. Na miejscu John odkrywa, że budynek został opanowany przez terrorystów. Nie czekając na wsparcie, robi wszystko, by uwolnić żonę i pozostałych zakładników.

Jak ja nienawidzę wakacji!
Odio l'estate
programme.desc: Odio l'estate: Directed by Massimo Venier. With Aldo Baglio, Giovanni Storti, Giacomo Poretti, Lucia Mascino. Three families end up in the same rented house. Throughout the summer, they become friends and rediscover how to enjoy life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10492998/","name":"Odio l'estate","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2Q5ZDdmZWItMmNiYi00MjU5LThmOTAtZDU5N2ZhYmM1NDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5OTQzNzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three families end up in the same rented house. programme.title: Pogotowie remontowe Wieśka 2
programme.desc: Dla wielu ludzi już sama wizja remontu jest niezwykle stresująca. Obawy okazują się uzasadnione, gdy pracownicy niesprawdzonych firm remontowych wyrządzają niewybaczalne szkody. Drugi sezon programu, w którym ceniony specjalista budowlany, Wiesław Skiba, naprawi błędy popełnione przez niekompetentnych kolegów po fachu oraz podpowie widzom, jak samodzielnie uporać się z drobnymi usterkami.

programme.title: Water for Elephants
Woda dla słoni
Water for Elephants
programme.desc:
Water for Elephants: Directed by Francis Lawrence. With Reese Witherspoon, Robert Pattinson, Christoph Waltz, Paul Schneider. Set in the 1930s, a former veterinary student takes a job in a travelling circus and falls in love with the ringmaster's wife." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1067583/","name":"Water for Elephants","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzMDU3NDEwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTI3MDU0NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in the 1930s, a former veterinary student takes a job in a travelling circus and falls in love with the ringmaster's wife.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1067583/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"GlimmerBunny"},"dateCreated":"2011-04-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A truly spectacular movie!","reviewBody":"OK, I'll try to tell you a bit of what I thought about "Water for Elephants", without spoiling anything. I have not read the novel (even though I plan to do it now) so I'm only offering my views on the movie.

First of all: It's amazingly beautiful. The costumes and sets are gorgeous, the cinematography is exquisite, the animals are cute (especially Rosie the elephant) and the three leads are very easy on the eyes as well. 

Robert Pattinson was actually quite good. This was a surprise to me, since I didn't really think he was anything special in any of the Twilight movies or "Remember Me". He looked very appropriate for the time the movie was set in, and even though I love Emile Hirsch (who auditioned for Jacob too) I'm confident that Robert was the best choice there was for this role, it was perfect for him. Hal Holbrook was also very fitting for the role of older Jacob. The two actors really made me believe that they were the same person in different stages of his life.

Reese Witherspoon was okay. She looked beautiful, was charming and cute but it felt like something was missing - however, I can't think of any other actress I would have liked better in the role, so I came to the conclusion that it was probably the character Marlena that was a little bland, not Reese. 

But the true star of this movie was Christoph Waltz. I may be a bit biased since I loved him in "Inglorious Basterds", but he was even more perfect in this movie. His portrayal of August was amazing, he made him likable and interesting and I was always compelled by his scenes. The character reminded me a lot of Miles in "King Kong" (played by Jack Black), a character that also wanted fame and success more than anything and used questionable and even cruel methods to get it. He was terrifying in some scenes too, but always believable. Also, in the beginning of the movie i really felt the chemistry between August and Marlena, which made the character even more interesting; however, I did feel like Jacob and Marlena had chemistry too, and in my opinion this way it was more realistic (both men loved her and she also cared about both of them). 

I loved the movie, and I really recommend it to everyone. I would sincerely give it 10/10 stars. Of course there was some parts of the movie I didn't like (particularly towards the end of it), but overall it was a magical, spectacular and epic period movie, and I can't wait to see it again!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":113964,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-04-22","keywords":"animal abuse,circus,elephant,ringmaster,train","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2: Water for Elephants","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1397594649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MzA4MjYxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc1NTYzNTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MzA4MjYxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc1NTYzNTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veterinary student (Robert Pattinson) abandons his studies after his parents are killed and joins a traveling circus as their vet, where he meets animal trainer August (Christoph Waltz) and his wife Marlena (Reese Witherspoon)."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500155/","name":"Robert Pattinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000702/","name":"Reese Witherspoon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910607/","name":"Christoph Waltz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1349376/","name":"Francis Lawrence"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0177280/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481418/","name":"Richard LaGravenese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2717485/","name":"Sara Gruen"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="
