programme.title: Apró mesék
Niewiarygodna historia
Apró mesék
programme.desc:
Apró mesék: Directed by Attila Szász. With Tamás Szabó Kimmel, Vica Kerekes, Levente Molnár, Bercel Tóth. Shortly after the end of World War II, a con man on the run finds himself in a passionate love affair that may well cost him his life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7757688/","name":"Apró mesék","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWRmM2JhOWMtZGYzMS00ZDQ0LTgyYjctYTM5NmM0ZjExYzVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDMyNTgyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shortly after the end of World War II, a con man on the run finds himself in a passionate love affair that may well cost him his life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7757688/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ops-52535"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"if you know...","reviewBody":"The 2nd world war history of the hungarian people, and the clamp against freedome inserted by the russians throughout the cold war, you may nod your head in reckognizion. i went as a child on summer holidays in the early -70's, and did run slalom inbetween russian soldiers at the gellerthegy cittadel that overviews the city of budapest, searching for my family that id løost in the citystreets.being a norwegian child with no language knowledge but with good sense of orientation, found my way back to the car at the park site at the citadell, being conforted and fed with soldiers chocolate, till my heard came strolling as if nothing had happened at all. thereafter ive always scouted my whereabouts to be able to find my track back to safety...but thats another story...

this film seems to me as very mixed on emotions, it has a story thats easymade, and ive seen the composition before, buit its hungarian, with pretty good acting, good traditional outfitting, nice cgi's, and where possible,nice choice of locations.

its a slow burning thriller black comedy that you either love or hat, so i shall not decide wether to see or not. i give it a 6 thanks to the subtitles that made the grumpy old man understand.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1229,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Drama","Romance","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-03-14","keywords":"year 1945,1940s,war ruins,neo noir,adultery","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tall Tales - Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4188913433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MDFlOWYtNWU2NS00ZmM0LTk2NTgtYWMxZjllZjJkODc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MDFlOWYtNWU2NS00ZmM0LTk2NTgtYWMxZjllZjJkODc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"1945, Hungary. Shortly after the end of World War II, when chaos and insecurity reign supreme in the country, a con man tries to take advantage of such confused times. Forced to flee Budapest, he's given shelter in the woods by a mysterious woman and his son. Still trying to confront his demons, he soon finds himself in a passionate love affair with the woman whose husband is about to return home from the front. IMDb data; ttnr: 7757688, Title: Apró mesék, --- Description: Apró mesék: Directed by Attila Szász. With Tamás Szabó Kimmel, Vica Kerekes, Levente Molnár, Bercel Tóth. Shortly after the end of World War II, a con man on the run finds himself in a passionate love affair that may well cost him his life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7757688/","name":"Apró mesék","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWRmM2JhOWMtZGYzMS00ZDQ0LTgyYjctYTM5NmM0ZjExYzVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDMyNTgyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shortly after the end of World War II, a con man on the run finds himself in a passionate love affair that may well cost him his life.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7757688/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ops-52535","dateCreated":"2021-01-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"if you know...","reviewBody":"The 2nd world war history of the hungarian people, and the clamp against freedome inserted by the russians throughout the cold war, you may nod your head in reckognizion. i went as a child on summer holidays in the early -70's, and did run slalom inbetween russian soldiers at the gellerthegy cittadel that overviews the city of budapest, searching for my family that id løost in the citystreets.being a norwegian child with no language knowledge but with good sense of orientation, found my way back to the car at the park site at the citadell, being conforted and fed with soldiers chocolate, till my heard came strolling as if nothing had happened at all. thereafter ive always scouted my whereabouts to be able to find my track back to safety...but thats another story...

this film seems to me as very mixed on emotions, it has a story thats easymade, and ive seen the composition before, buit its hungarian, with pretty good acting, good traditional outfitting, nice cgi's, and where possible,nice choice of locations.

its a slow burning thriller black comedy that you either love or hat, so i shall not decide wether to see or not. i give it a 6 thanks to the subtitles that made the grumpy old man understand.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1229,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"genre":["Drama","Romance","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-03-14","keywords":"year 1945,1940s,war ruins,neo noir,adultery","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tall Tales - Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4188913433","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MDFlOWYtNWU2NS00ZmM0LTk2NTgtYWMxZjllZjJkODc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MDFlOWYtNWU2NS00ZmM0LTk2NTgtYWMxZjllZjJkODc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"1945, Hungary. programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
Córki Rzeszy
Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc:
Six Minutes to Midnight: Directed by Andy Goddard. With Nigel Lindsay, Judi Dench, Eddie Izzard, Jim Broadbent. UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear on a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job 6 days later, secretly trying to find out what happened." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5114840/","name":"Six Minutes to Midnight","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGY1YWI4NzEtNmYyMS00NWFjLTk3YTgtNTkzNWFkZDlmNmZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear on a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job 6 days later, secretly trying to find out what happened.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5114840/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cruzarts-73946"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Top cast, beautiful production, lacks focus","reviewBody":"I was excited to see this, as it's Eddie Izzard's first co-written screenplay. I found it very predictable. One protracted chase comes across as unintentionally funny. Another series of dramatic moments during shoot-outs are disappointingly predictable -- as if adapted from dated material and not reworked.

Izzard is excellent, as is Dench. D'arcy's character is strangely under-developed. There is no mention whether the story is based on a true story from IFC or other project announcements, so my assumption is that it is not.

The "close calls" in the film are an "embarrassment of riches," which in detective lingo, indicates fraudulence. Unfortunately, SIX MINUTES TO MIDNIGHT suffers from such an underlying impression.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3220,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-15","keywords":"world war two","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4131766553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMzNWE4NDUtYzA1OC00ZjM1LWIyZjYtNGJjODNlOTcwYjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMzNWE4NDUtYzA1OC00ZjM1LWIyZjYtNGJjODNlOTcwYjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"In the summer of 1939, school teacher Thomas Miller (Eddie Izzard) takes a last minute role teaching English at the Augusta-Victoria College, Bexhill-on-Sea, a finishing school on the south coast of England. Despite the political storm clouds forming across Europe, daughters of influential families in Nazi Germany learn deportment, Shakespeare and how to be faithful members of Hitler’s League of German Girls."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0512283/","name":"Nigel Lindsay"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001132/","name":"Judi Dench"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412850/","name":"Eddie Izzard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323758/","name":"Andy Goddard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484683/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0468830/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0857703/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412850/","name":"Eddie Izzard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427714/","name":"Celyn Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323758/","name":"Andy Goddard"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lara
Lara
programme.desc: Lara: Directed by Jan-Ole Gerster. With Tom Schilling, Mala Emde, Rainer Bock, Maria Dragus. It's Lara's 60th birthday, and this very evening, her son will be giving his debut piano concert. Lara mapped out his musical career. But Lara is not welcome at his debut performance. Even if Lara engages, everything gets out of control." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7275830/","name":"Lara","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTAxYTk0MjctN2M4YS00ZDA0LWE1MDctNzhiMjA5NjA2MmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUyNjM3ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"It's Lara's 60th birthday, and this very evening, her son will be giving his debut piano concert. Lara mapped out his musical career. But Lara is not welcome at his debut performance. Even if Lara engages, everything gets out of cont","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7275830/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CitizenDevi"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great and different follow-up to Oh Boy.","reviewBody":"The first movie I ever saw at a film festival, albeit it that the Ludwigsburger Lichtspielliebe is a very very new and very very very small and adorable little film festival with only one screening room. But that counts and is all very well done, and the director and lead actor showed up after the film for a fairly lengthy discussion. Lara was one of my most anticipated movies of this year because I love the first film Jan-Ole Gerster did, Oh Boy. This one yet again tells a big story in a down to earth and believable form where the way characters act and speak tells you all you need to know about them, and then some. Yet again it's also about family and being in a bad place in life. Lara, different from his first film, is for a big part about passion and creativity, and it's beautifully directed and written, and of course the performances are great. I'm very happy it turned out so well and hope it won't take Gerster seven years again to put out a new film. I don't know what took him so long, maybe it was just about financing. Anyway, see this one if you can please, it's definitely worth a watch and so full of life, never boring, always being real, and you can tell they really cared about making this as good as it can be. This is a film everyone will be able to get something out of. Fittingly, at one point a character thinks to himself, does the world really need my music or has it been done already and is pointless. I can tell you Lara is thankfully anything but pointless."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1856,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-11-07","keywords":"60th birthday,mother son conflict,piano teacher,suicidal thoughts,mother son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi977779737","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY0MTNlYzktNWQxZi00MzRjLThmZTEtZjZlZjZjOWU4NjZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY0MTNlYzktNWQxZi00MzRjLThmZTEtZjZlZjZjOWU4NjZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771713/","name":"Tom Schilling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3605549/","name":"Mala Emde"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0090674/","name":"Rainer Bock"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1673756/","name":"Jan-Ole Gerster"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323020/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051615/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002254/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3092424/","name":"Blaz Kutin"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

La nuit venue
programme.desc: La nuit venue: Directed by Frédéric Farrucci. With Guang Huo, Camélia Jordana, Xun Liang, Maurice Cheng. One night, Noémie, a stripper and bewitching call girl, gets into Jin's cab. programme.title: Dramat
Hra
programme.desc: Niewielkie czeskie miasteczko. Młody reżyser, Petr (Jiří Mádl), wpada na pomysł, by wystawić na deskach teatru starożytną grecką sztukę. Po dłuższym namyśle wybiera "Fedrę" Eurypidesa. Jego prace nad projektem zaburzają problemy zawodowe oraz brak porozumienia z żoną. Przytłoczony kłopotami mężczyzna wdaje się w pozamałżeński romans, co znacznie komplikuje jego życie.

programme.title: Minyan
Minjan
Minyan
programme.desc: Minyan: Directed by Eric Steel. With Riley Barnes, Brooke Bloom, Michael Broadhurst, Mark Bruk. A young Jewish man is caught between thrilling private trysts and his repressive family in this thoughtful drama set in 1980s Brooklyn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10268550/","name":"Minyan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA3NGFhMGMtNzYzYy00NTM5LTkzMWMtMmUyMDZlNTdlMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMyMzI4MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Jewish man is caught between thrilling private trysts and his repressive family in this thoughtful drama set in 1980s Brooklyn.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10268550/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thejasonstation"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unexpectedly moving and thought-provoking","reviewBody":"I didn't have high expectations when starting this film, and yet it crept up on me. Expertly crafted, it's a subtle, yet powerful piece. programme.title: Mossad
Mosad
Ha'Mossad
programme.desc:
Mossad: Directed by Alon Gur Arye. With Tsahi Halevi, Efrat Dor, Tal Friedman, Adi Himelbloy. After an American tech-billionaire is kidnapped in Israel, the Mossad rushes to save him while the CIA send their best agent to help out." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10370402/","name":"Mossad","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWI4NTMwNWUtMzIxYy00Y2JmLTk0N2QtOThiZDQ0Y2MxMzAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzUwNzEyOTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"After an American tech-billionaire is kidnapped in Israel, the Mossad rushes to save him while the CIA send their best agent to help out.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10370402/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dromasca"},"dateCreated":"2019-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Johnny English has a rival in the Mossad","reviewBody":"Everyone enjoys a good laugh, and the summer cinema season is optimal for comedies. It's just the right time to watch a movie like "Mossad" written and directed by Alon Gur Arye, a parody in the genre of the "Naked Gun" series that combined comedy and espionage made in the 1990s by the American ZAZ trio (Zucker, Abrahams, Zucker), or of the British films that had as a hero Johnny English (played by Rowan Atkinson), back on screen last year. I saw the movie yesterday evening at its first or second public screening, before the official premiere, in a cinema hall that was full with an audience that reacted enthusiastically. I can bet that a new Israeli cult comedy is about to be born, and that Britain's secret agent Johnny English has now a serious Israeli rival in the secret agent Guy Moran (interpreted by Tsahi Halevi), equally ready to save the world risking to destroy it ten times.

The satirical arrows in this cinematic parody genre are usually directed towards two main directions - a "serious" theme from an area of activity with visibility and of major interest for the public (in this case the fight against terrorism and the secret wars led by the national spy organizations - Mossad, CIA) and the 'serious' movies related to this theme (here the action films and series such as 'James Bond', 'Mission Impossible', etc.). In order to succeed, such films should avoid dealing with any of the 'sacred cows' and should include as many jokes as possible with references to known realities or famous films, all packed in a story which aims to be coherent but is explicitly not taken too seriously. I think the screenwriter and director Alon Gur Arye has very honorably succeeded to meet these conditions and the result is a fun and engaging movie.

The pace of jokes and comic situations is considerable and these are present from the first frame before the generic to the last one at the final credits. I'm not convinced that everything will pass the screen to the international audiences, and as the screening had English subtitles I noticed that some adaptations are being attempted. The level of satire and critical humor dealing with the bombastic myths, local bureaucracy, or typology of secret war heroes did not seem to me to fall under anything else in the genre, the latest 'Johnny English', for example. I can say the same thing about the level of acting - Dvir Benedek and Tsahi Halevi are excellent in the key roles, the feminine presences are attractive and expressive, Tal Friedman creates an original role that makes us forget his appearances in popular comic television programs, and the Israeli screen and stage veterans Gila Almador and Ilan Dar act in the movie with obvious pleasure. They all have fun and make us have fun. The less successful parts of this film are related to the coherence of the action (there is no moment of real suspense) and the special effects that have suffered from a clear lack of funds, with results visible today in the era of spectacular graphic effects. These details cannot spoil too much of the pleasure I had watching "Mossad", which has good chances to be the summer blockbuster in Israel, and to be successful elsewhere and beyond its first season of screening.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":597,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"genre":["Action","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2019-06-27","keywords":"parody,mossad,israel,airplane,reference to naked gun","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"MOSSAD! Trailer - Hebrew","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3143220761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzM0ZTBlNDktZjRlYi00N2VkLTg0NzUtOTIyNjIxZGUwYmRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzM0ZTBlNDktZjRlYi00N2VkLTg0NzUtOTIyNjIxZGUwYmRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"MOSSAD! Trailer in Hebrew"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5674436/","name":"Tsahi Halevi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3575889/","name":"Efrat Dor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0295383/","name":"Tal Friedman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1802591/","name":"Alon Gur Arye"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0481846/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037930/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1802591/","name":"Alon Gur Arye"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001878/","name":"David Zucker"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Driveways
Podjazdy
Driveways
programme.desc:
Driveways: Directed by Andrew Ahn. With Lucas Jaye, Hong Chau, Brian Dennehy, Laurent Rejto. A lonesome boy accompanies his mother on a trip to clean out his late aunt's house, and ends up forming an unexpected friendship with the retiree who lives next door." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9318280/","name":"Driveways","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2E4MGRmZDQtMTUxYy00OWE2LWE4ZGUtMGI0ZjI4MGUxMjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjA2OTE4OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A lonesome boy accompanies his mother on a trip to clean out his late aunt's house, and ends up forming an unexpected friendship with the retiree who lives next door.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9318280/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jdesando"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A sweet film about the friendship between a boy and a man. Dennehy has rarely been better.","reviewBody":""Drive a little slower. Take your time. Take a good look at stuff." Del (Brian Dennehy)

Driveways is an internet film taking its time letting us know that friendship and love have no racial or age boundaries. We've seen this motif before: 8-year-old Cody befriends laconic octogenarian neighbor Del (it's not too much Gran Torino or UP) with the least sentimentality among the three and the least dialogue.

Yet, the love that envelops them, even with Cody's single Asian-American mom, Kathy (Hong Chau), who is not a stirring mother, is so unprepossessing that like Cody at his 9th birthday, life has happened in small increments, almost imperceptibly. The life including bullying kids and cleaning up a recently-deceased Aunt's mess of a home takes on a romantic sheen as the duo experience kindly neighbors and a comfortably-cleaned home.

In a small way it's like Seinfeld without the laughs-it's about nothing or rather the little things of life that begin to make up a happy life. Firecrackers in the backyard by the bully boys seem more like a celebration of a new life for Kathy and Cody than a bombardment. It's also a fine addition to the coming-of-age canon, a staple from Star Wars through Driveways.

It's one of Brian Dennehy's last roles (he recently died), but one of his finest because it doesn't require him to use his former football- player heft or his menacing sheriff mien as in First Blood. The friendship between Cody and veteran Del is the real deal. Del has one nostalgic speech that you wish more of because he is talking, as in the opening quote, about enjoying the small parts of life whether you're 8 or 80.

"Small" as in Driveways, where the titular constructions are more than the separation between suburban homes-they're what binds them."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5528,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-05-07","keywords":"friendship,dome magnifier,8 year old,8 year old boy,old man young boy relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi825803033","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgzYzNjODAtMjQ2NC00ZTgwLWE2NmItNjEyNTdmZThkYTM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgzYzNjODAtMjQ2NC00ZTgwLWE2NmItNjEyNTdmZThkYTM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A lonesome boy accompanies his mother on a trip to clean out his late aunt's house, and ends up forming an unexpected friendship with the retiree who lives next door."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5102227/","name":"Lucas Jaye"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2186865/","name":"Hong Chau"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001133/","name":"Brian Dennehy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3821224/","name":"Andrew Ahn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0135778/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0464499/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0729964/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2314136/","name":"Hannah Bos"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3227768/","name":"Paul Thureen"}],"duration":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="

The friendship between Cody and veteran Del is the real deal. Del has one nostalgic speech that you wish more of because he is talking, as in the opening quote, about enjoying the small parts of life whether you're 8 or 80.

"Small" as in Driveways, where the titular constructions are more than the separation between suburban homes-they're what binds them.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5528,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-05-07","keywords":"friendship,dome magnifier,8 year old,8 year old boy,old man young boy relationship","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi825803033","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgzYzNjODAtMjQ2NC00ZTgwLWE2NmItNjEyNTdmZThkYTM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgzYzNjODAtMjQ2NC00ZTgwLWE2NmItNjEyNTdmZThkYTM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A lonesome boy accompanies his mother on a trip to clean out his late aunt's house, and ends up forming an unexpected friendship with the retiree who lives next door.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5102227/","name":"Lucas Jaye","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2186865/","name":"Hong Chau","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001133/","name":"Brian Dennehy"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3821224/","name":"Andrew Ahn"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0135778/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0464499/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0729964/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2314136/","name":"Hannah Bos","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3227768/","name":"Paul Thureen"],"duration":"PT1H23M"</script><metacontent="

When a gas station is held at gunpoint by a desperate man in need of cash, a lonely and unstable gas station attendant, tired of being overshadowed by her more outgoing co-worker, finds an opportunity to make a connection with the robber." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8009314/","name":"Burn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQ5Y2MxMTUtZGRiYy00YjAxLWEzNjEtM2I2Y2EzMDI0YjA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQwMTY2Nzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a gas station is held at gunpoint by a desperate man in need of cash, a lonely and unstable gas station attendant, tired of being overshadowed by her more outgoing co-worker, finds an opportunity to make a connection with the ro","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8009314/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ramspace1"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Crazy people make for good thrillers.","reviewBody":"Just imagine that your are a night petrol pump shop attendant and a robber comes along. The robber points a gun at you, asks for the cash, you give the money, the robber runs away, and finally you call the cops. This real life situation would make for a very dull movie. But with Burn, that is not the case. There is just too much crazy thinking, too many uncalled for words in the dialogues. So it all leads to a lot of trouble. The lucky ones are the quiet ones. I saw it with a group of friends and our cheap comments were flying fast and furious. programme.title: Pilátus
Piłat
Pilátus
programme.desc: Pilátus: Directed by Linda Dombrovszky. With Ildikó Hámori, Anna Györgyi, Zsolt Kovács, Sándor Terhes. The mother loves her daughter; the daughter loves her mother. The tragedy of misunderstood love. The adaptation of Magda Szabó's novel translated into twelve languages." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10398080/","name":"Pilátus","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTZmMWIyZGYtZDZlZS00YWVkLTlhZjMtNGE4YjM4OWYxZTkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzM3NzY3NTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"The mother loves her daughter; the daughter loves her mother. The tragedy of misunderstood love. The adaptation of Magda Szabó's novel translated into twelve languages.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10398080/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"b_velkova"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A very polite attempt on a primal topic","reviewBody":"The dynamics is very real, but the tone is too formal, even for a doctor's family. Coldness is one thing, but you can't get that distant, no matter the level of dysfunctionality. I remember calling my mother by her last name when I was a teenager, but I never went to her room with the newspaper and asked: "What type of news would you like to hear, mother?" Also, the story is a bit one-sided and doesn't go very deep: behind such clashes usually there are reasons bigger than the mere generational conflict, or a "misunderstood love" as it goes in the description. All in all, a very polite attempt on a primal topic, but for what it is, it's very well executed.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":132,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-01-29","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0405418/","name":"Ildikó Hámori"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350587/","name":"Anna Györgyi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0468514/","name":"Zsolt Kovács"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2843398/","name":"Linda Dombrovszky"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0747074/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4302531/","name":"György Somogyi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0843651/","name":"Magda Szabó"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2703215/","name":"Sándor Szélesi"}]}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lara
Lara
programme.desc: Lara: Directed by Jan-Ole Gerster. With Tom Schilling, Mala Emde, Rainer Bock, Maria Dragus. It's Lara's 60th birthday, and this very evening, her son will be giving his debut piano concert. Lara mapped out his musical career. But Lara is not welcome at his debut performance. Even if Lara engages, everything gets out of control." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7275830/","name":"Lara","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTAxYTk0MjctN2M4YS00ZDA0LWE1MDctNzhiMjA5NjA2MmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUyNjM3ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"It's Lara's 60th birthday, and this very evening, her son will be giving his debut piano concert. Lara mapped out his musical career. But Lara is not welcome at his debut performance. Even if Lara engages, everything gets out of cont","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7275830/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CitizenDevi"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great and different follow-up to Oh Boy.","reviewBody":"The first movie I ever saw at a film festival, albeit it that the Ludwigsburger Lichtspielliebe is a very very new and very very very small and adorable little film festival with only one screening room. But that counts and is all very well done, and the director and lead actor showed up after the film for a fairly lengthy discussion. Lara was one of my most anticipated movies of this year because I love the first film Jan-Ole Gerster did, Oh Boy. This one yet again tells a big story in a down to earth and believable form where the way characters act and speak tells you all you need to know about them, and then some. Yet again it's also about family and being in a bad place in life. Lara, different from his first film, is for a big part about passion and creativity, and it's beautifully directed and written, and of course the performances are great. I'm very happy it turned out so well and hope it won't take Gerster seven years again to put out a new film. I don't know what took him so long, maybe it was just about financing. Anyway, see this one if you can please, it's definitely worth a watch and so full of life, never boring, always being real, and you can tell they really cared about making this as good as it can be. This is a film everyone will be able to get something out of. Fittingly, at one point a character thinks to himself, does the world really need my music or has it been done already and is pointless. I can tell you Lara is thankfully anything but pointless."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1856,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-11-07","keywords":"60th birthday,mother son conflict,piano teacher,suicidal thoughts,mother son relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi977779737","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY0MTNlYzktNWQxZi00MzRjLThmZTEtZjZlZjZjOWU4NjZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY0MTNlYzktNWQxZi00MzRjLThmZTEtZjZlZjZjOWU4NjZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771713/","name":"Tom Schilling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3605549/","name":"Mala Emde"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0090674/","name":"Rainer Bock"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1673756/","name":"Jan-Ole Gerster"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323020/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051615/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002254/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3092424/","name":"Blaz Kutin"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

Even if Lara engages, everything gets out of cont","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7275830/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"CitizenDevi","dateCreated":"2019-11-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great and different follow-up to Oh Boy.","reviewBody":"The first movie I ever saw at a film festival, albeit it that the Ludwigsburger Lichtspielliebe is a very very new and very very very small and adorable little film festival with only one screening room. But that counts and is all very well done, and the director and lead actor showed up after the film for a fairly lengthy discussion. Lara was one of my most anticipated movies of this year because I love the first film Jan-Ole Gerster did, Oh Boy. This one yet again tells a big story in a down to earth and believable form where the way characters act and speak tells you all you need to know about them, and then some. Yet again it's also about family and being in a bad place in life. Lara, different from his first film, is for a big part about passion and creativity, and it's beautifully directed and written, and of course the performances are great. I'm very happy it turned out so well and hope it won't take Gerster seven years again to put out a new film. I don't know what took him so long, maybe it was just about financing. Anyway, see this one if you can please, it's definitely worth a watch and so full of life, never boring, always being real, and you can tell they really cared about making this as good as it can be. This is a film everyone will be able to get something out of. Fittingly, at one point a character thinks to himself, does the world really need my music or has it been done already and is pointless. programme.title: Driveways
Podjazdy
Driveways
programme.desc:
Driveways: Directed by Andrew Ahn. With Lucas Jaye, Hong Chau, Brian Dennehy, Laurent Rejto. A lonesome boy accompanies his mother on a trip to clean out his late aunt's house, and ends up forming an unexpected friendship with the retiree who lives next door." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9318280/","name":"Driveways","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2E4MGRmZDQtMTUxYy00OWE2LWE4ZGUtMGI0ZjI4MGUxMjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjA2OTE4OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A lonesome boy accompanies his mother on a trip to clean out his late aunt's house, and ends up forming an unexpected friendship with the retiree who lives next door.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9318280/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jdesando"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A sweet film about the friendship between a boy and a man. Dennehy has rarely been better.","reviewBody":""Drive a little slower. Take your time. Take a good look at stuff." Del (Brian Dennehy)

Driveways is an internet film taking its time letting us know that friendship and love have no racial or age boundaries. We've seen this motif before: 8-year-old Cody befriends laconic octogenarian neighbor Del (it's not too much Gran Torino or UP) with the least sentimentality among the three and the least dialogue.

Yet, the love that envelops them, even with Cody's single Asian-American mom, Kathy (Hong Chau), who is not a stirring mother, is so unprepossessing that like Cody at his 9th birthday, life has happened in small increments, almost imperceptibly. The life including bullying kids and cleaning up a recently-deceased Aunt's mess of a home takes on a romantic sheen as the duo experience kindly neighbors and a comfortably-cleaned home.

In a small way it's like Seinfeld without the laughs-it's about nothing or rather the little things of life that begin to make up a happy life. Firecrackers in the backyard by the bully boys seem more like a celebration of a new life for Kathy and Cody than a bombardment. It's also a fine addition to the coming-of-age canon, a staple from Star Wars through Driveways.

It's one of Brian Dennehy's last roles (he recently died), but one of his finest because it doesn't require him to use his former football- player heft or his menacing sheriff mien as in First Blood. The friendship between Cody and veteran Del is the real deal. Del has one nostalgic speech that you wish more of because he is talking, as in the opening quote, about enjoying the small parts of life whether you're 8 or 80.

"Small" as in Driveways, where the titular constructions are more than the separation between suburban homes-they're what binds them."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5528,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-05-07","keywords":"friendship,dome magnifier,8 year old,8 year old boy,old man young boy relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi825803033","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgzYzNjODAtMjQ2NC00ZTgwLWE2NmItNjEyNTdmZThkYTM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgzYzNjODAtMjQ2NC00ZTgwLWE2NmItNjEyNTdmZThkYTM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A lonesome boy accompanies his mother on a trip to clean out his late aunt's house, and ends up forming an unexpected friendship with the retiree who lives next door."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5102227/","name":"Lucas Jaye"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2186865/","name":"Hong Chau"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001133/","name":"Brian Dennehy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3821224/","name":"Andrew Ahn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0135778/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0464499/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0729964/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2314136/","name":"Hannah Bos"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3227768/","name":"Paul Thureen"}],"duration":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="

La Nave del Olvido
programme.desc: La Nave del Olvido: Directed by Nicol Ruiz Benavides. With Rosa Ramírez, Romana Satt, Gabriela Arancibia, Cristóbal Ruiz. Claudina is a traditional woman from the countryside. After the pass away of her husband, she gets into a lonely routine. Having a difficult economic situation, Claudina has to move with her dearest grandson Cristóbal, and her daughter Alejandra, knowing that both women have a distanced relationship. Living together, Claudina meets the neighbor Elsa, an independent and married woman who sings on a hidden bar called "Porvenir" (The Future.) Claudina starts a relationship with Elsa, getting in love. Since then, she develops a journey of self-knowledge to be free, under the judgment of her daughter and friends on a religious and conservatory little town, obsessed with UFO sighting." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12888166/","name":"La Nave del Olvido","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMThkMDJjNzktMGJmNy00OWMyLWI3ZjktNjczZTAzNTk1YTE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMzODQ4NzQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Claudina is a traditional woman from the countryside. After the pass away of her husband, she gets into a lonely routine. Having a difficult economic situation, Claudina has to move with her dearest grandson Cristóbal, and her daught","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12888166/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"roger-99-171599"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Delicate and meditative !","reviewBody":"In a Chilean town surrounded by UFO's, an aging widow forms a special and risky bond with a bon-vivant lady, leading to a revolutionary romance. As both women explore elements of time lost and regrets, they open up for a new chance while awakening their sexuality. Living in such conservative and small village, the only place they find solace is a forbidden night club, whose owner, an elderly glamorous gay man, is one of her childhood friends. They dream of escaping the archaic system and community, especially when the protagonist's daughter rejects her mother's new lifestyle, but will have to deal with unexpected challenges. Kynodontas
programme.desc: Kynodontas: Directed by Yorgos Lanthimos. With Christos Stergioglou, Michele Valley, Angeliki Papoulia, Hristos Passalis. A controlling, manipulative father locks his three adult offspring in a state of perpetual childhood by keeping them prisoner within the sprawling family compound." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1379182/","name":"Kynodontas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyOTkyMDE5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjIwNzQwMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A controlling, manipulative father locks his three adult offspring in a state of perpetual childhood by keeping them prisoner within the sprawling family compound.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1379182/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"xfreakart"},"dateCreated":"2010-06-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"love or hate","reviewBody":"I was expecting some kind of "The Village" film... Just to avoid spoiling.. The lights turned on, the credits were running and everyone was quiet and searching for answers in others looks. Its best surprise that I've got in years. You don't have to be special to watch it, just sit and you'll end it living it, even that it isn't your life. I appreciate latter how good the movie was when I realized that all the scenes didn't need background violins to drive your emotions to a certain field. Everything goes by itself naturally. I just registered to post this, as I couldn't believe those bad reviews. I'm a normal guy that doesn't read reviews, but this movie is different and I was curious about how would other people feel about it. Maybe its one of those that you just love or hate, but at the end you'll feel something that isn't indifference.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":89615,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-11-11","keywords":"overprotective father,misuse of language,isolated house,child abuse,social isolation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Guide to the Films of Yorgos Lanthimos","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi998160921","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE0ODVhZTQtZDJlYS00NmRjLWI2ZTItODE0YTgwODhlOTllXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hZGV0aXNj._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE0ODVhZTQtZDJlYS00NmRjLWI2ZTItODE0YTgwODhlOTllXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hZGV0aXNj._V1_.jpg","description":"Awkward adults, dark humor, and absurd circumstances: Welcome to the films of Yorgos Lanthimos. From 'Dogtooth' to 'The Favourite,' we break down the auteur director's cinematic trademarks."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1176651/","name":"Christos Stergioglou"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0885091/","name":"Michele Valley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1465326/","name":"Angeliki Papoulia"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0487166/","name":"Yorgos Lanthimos"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0263183/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042307/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0269933/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3328207/","name":"Efthymis Filippou"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0487166/","name":"Yorgos Lanthimos"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

The Resident
programme.desc: The Resident: Created by Amy Holden Jones, Hayley Schore, Roshan Sethi. With Matt Czuchry, Manish Dayal, Bruce Greenwood, Emily VanCamp. A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6483832/","name":"The Resident","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc1MmE1NGYtMzFlYS00YTNmLThjNmEtMjQ5NzY4NmJkZTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODkxMzcxOTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6483832/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bjapexnc"},"dateCreated":"2018-01-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worth a watch judge for yourself","reviewBody":"I actually like and hate the show at the same time. While I like the doctors and nurses I stay angry with the administrative side of things and those who are representing them. While some reviews here say how unrealistic the show is the most unrealistic part is the doctors who stand up to the bureaucrats. If you are a patient who has been turn down because you didn't have the money or insurance to pay for the needed medical attention you know it is closer to reality then those here want to admit. I say watch it and judge for yourself. If you can get past wanting to punch the head of surgery then you might just find that you like it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":22179,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-21","keywords":"two word title,atlanta georgia,georgia,hospital,medical","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0194516/","name":"Matt Czuchry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2110485/","name":"Manish Dayal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339304/","name":"Bruce Greenwood"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0683032/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427468/","name":"Amy Holden Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2735698/","name":"Hayley Schore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6149734/","name":"Roshan Sethi"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi528529689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Resident" follows Dr. Conrad Hawkins, one of the best doctors at Chastain Park Memorial Hospital. If you are a patient who has been turn down because you didn't have the money or insurance to pay for the needed medical attention you know it is closer to reality then those here want to admit. I say watch it and judge for yourself. If you can get past wanting to punch the head of surgery then you might just find that you like it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":22179,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-21","keywords":"two word title,atlanta georgia,georgia,hospital,medical","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0194516/","name":"Matt Czuchry","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2110485/","name":"Manish Dayal","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339304/","name":"Bruce Greenwood"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152181/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0683032/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427468/","name":"Amy Holden Jones","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2735698/","name":"Hayley Schore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6149734/","name":"Roshan Sethi"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi528529689","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Resident" follows Dr. Conrad Hawkins, one of the best doctors at Chastain Park Memorial Hospital. programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
Park Jurajski
Jurassic Park
programme.desc: The Lost World: Jurassic Park: Directed by Steven Spielberg. With Jeff Goldblum, Julianne Moore, Pete Postlethwaite, Arliss Howard. A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119567/","name":"The Lost World: Jurassic Park","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDFlMmM4Y2QtNDg1ZS00MWVlLTlmODgtZDdhYjY5YjdhN2M0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MjkwNjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119567/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eternalsea"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very good sequel","reviewBody":"The Lost World is the sequel to the 1993 classic Jurassic Park. Whilst this film is not as good as the original it does stand up well as a sequel. Jeff Goldblum returns as Ian Malcolm. Malcolm has been asked to return to another Island were Dinosaurs have been allowed to live without cages. Malcolm refuses but when he finds out his paleontolagist girlfriend is already there he goes with a team of documentariens to rescue her. However several accidents ensue and they are left stranded on the Island with a second party. The film does not have the all round strength of the first and is far more dependant on thrills and its visual effects this time round. It does however succeed as good entertainment and its better than the third installment in the franchise by quite a bit. The Dino sequences are handled well with the Raptors in the long grass being the highlight of those and quite possibly the entire film. The T-rex features strongly again ( and this time there's two of them) along with a new and nasty little green dinosaur compsagnathus. The acting is'nt Oscar worthy or anything like it but the characters do have some charm and when they are put in danger you care what happens to them which is always a good sign. It does suffer a little from a bloated and anti climatic ending that is funny for about 2 minutes but I wont spoil it for you none the less. I give the Lost World its high rating because it does exactly what it sets out to do, entertain us. So I think its fair we overlook some of its flaws as with any kind of blockbuster sequel they are always there.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":395494,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1997-05-23","keywords":"dinosaur,costa rica,dog's death,blockbuster video,dog","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Jurassic Park Trilogy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2525535257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NzcwMDE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1MDg3NQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NzcwMDE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1MDg3NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jurassic Park, The Lost World: Jurassic Park and Jurassic Park III debut as a trilogy set on Blu-rayÂ™ October 25, 2011."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000156/","name":"Jeff Goldblum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000592/","name":"Pete Postlethwaite"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0437457/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000341/","name":"Michael Crichton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="

Whilst this film is not as good as the original it does stand up well as a sequel. Jeff Goldblum returns as Ian Malcolm. Malcolm has been asked to return to another Island were Dinosaurs have been allowed to live without cages. Malcolm refuses but when he finds out his paleontolagist girlfriend is already there he goes with a team of documentariens to rescue her. However several accidents ensue and they are left stranded on the Island with a second party. The film does not have the all round strength of the first and is far more dependant on thrills and its visual effects this time round. It does however succeed as good entertainment and its better than the third installment in the franchise by quite a bit. Jurassic Park III
programme.desc:
Jurassic Park III: Directed by Joe Johnston. With Sam Neill, William H. Macy, Téa Leoni, Alessandro Nivola. A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0163025/","name":"Jurassic Park III","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDMyZGJjOGItYjJkZC00MDVlLWE0Y2YtZGIwMDExYWE3MGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDYyMDk5MTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0163025/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"UACW"},"dateCreated":"2005-06-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Eminently Forgettable","reviewBody":"Why did Sam Neill return to the beasts? Why did Spielberg? Schindler's List: The Return would make more sense. Sly Stallone has nothing on this bazillionaire.

And perhaps worst of all is the totally unimportant score of Williams. Williams can write the occasional catchy tune, especially if it's supposed to be in the spirit of that great soul and blues man John Philip Sousa, but ask him to write incidental or a love theme and you go turkey. In fact it's a good guess that Star Wars I and II foundered as bad as they did because the score enhanced this empty stilted feeling.

If one thing remains - even subliminally - after JP3 it's the totally spiritless and uninspired score. Why the rest of that crew - Sam what were you thinking - would return to the big bugs is beyond comprehension.

Rent Rocky XXXIV instead."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":305794,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2001-09-26","keywords":"dinosaur,costa rica,cgi animal in live action title,spinosaurus,island","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Jurassic Park Trilogy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2525535257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NzcwMDE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1MDg3NQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NzcwMDE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1MDg3NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jurassic Park, The Lost World: Jurassic Park and Jurassic Park III debut as a trilogy set on Blu-rayÂ™ October 25, 2011."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000554/","name":"Sam Neill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000513/","name":"William H. Macy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000495/","name":"Téa Leoni"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002653/","name":"Joe Johnston"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000341/","name":"Michael Crichton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0118224/","name":"Peter Buchman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0668247/","name":"Alexander Payne"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
Assassin's Creed
programme.desc:
Assassin's Creed: Directed by Justin Kurzel. With Michael Fassbender, Marion Cotillard, Jeremy Irons, Brendan Gleeson. Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar de Nerha and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, before taking on the secret Templar society." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2094766/","name":"Assassin's Creed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzE1OTczNTc1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzgyMDI3MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar de Nerha and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, before taking on the secret Templar society.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2094766/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"roderick_stout"},"dateCreated":"2017-01-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good, but not as good as it could've been","reviewBody":"As a fan of the game series, my expectations were quite high. I was therefore pleased to see that a lot of the movie can be related back to the games. The story features are similar as well as the historic atmosphere. The fighting scenes are nicely shown, but are a bit to dominant throughout the entire movie. The depth of the story can be better as well.

The actors do a good job, but there isn't much time to really get to know them.

All in all, a movie that did not disappoint me as an Assassins Creed fan, but not the best movie of the year either.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":192768,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2016-12-28","keywords":"based on video game,assassin,secret society,spain,spanish inquisition","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1056093721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMzU3MzQ5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTkzMTYzMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMzU3MzQ5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTkzMTYzMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, he discovers he is a descendant of the secret Assassins society."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1055413/","name":"Michael Fassbender"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0182839/","name":"Marion Cotillard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000460/","name":"Jeremy Irons"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0997291/","name":"Justin Kurzel"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109033/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2078681/","name":"Michael Lesslie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177836/","name":"Adam Cooper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0171651/","name":"Bill Collage"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
Park Jurajski
Jurassic Park
programme.desc: The Lost World: Jurassic Park: Directed by Steven Spielberg. With Jeff Goldblum, Julianne Moore, Pete Postlethwaite, Arliss Howard. A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119567/","name":"The Lost World: Jurassic Park","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDFlMmM4Y2QtNDg1ZS00MWVlLTlmODgtZDdhYjY5YjdhN2M0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MjkwNjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119567/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eternalsea"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very good sequel","reviewBody":"The Lost World is the sequel to the 1993 classic Jurassic Park. Whilst this film is not as good as the original it does stand up well as a sequel. Jeff Goldblum returns as Ian Malcolm. Malcolm has been asked to return to another Island were Dinosaurs have been allowed to live without cages. Malcolm refuses but when he finds out his paleontolagist girlfriend is already there he goes with a team of documentariens to rescue her. However several accidents ensue and they are left stranded on the Island with a second party. The film does not have the all round strength of the first and is far more dependant on thrills and its visual effects this time round. It does however succeed as good entertainment and its better than the third installment in the franchise by quite a bit. The Dino sequences are handled well with the Raptors in the long grass being the highlight of those and quite possibly the entire film. The T-rex features strongly again ( and this time there's two of them) along with a new and nasty little green dinosaur compsagnathus. The acting is'nt Oscar worthy or anything like it but the characters do have some charm and when they are put in danger you care what happens to them which is always a good sign. It does suffer a little from a bloated and anti climatic ending that is funny for about 2 minutes but I wont spoil it for you none the less. I give the Lost World its high rating because it does exactly what it sets out to do, entertain us. So I think its fair we overlook some of its flaws as with any kind of blockbuster sequel they are always there.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":395494,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1997-05-23","keywords":"dinosaur,costa rica,dog's death,blockbuster video,dog","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Jurassic Park Trilogy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2525535257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NzcwMDE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1MDg3NQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NzcwMDE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTY1MDg3NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jurassic Park, The Lost World: Jurassic Park and Jurassic Park III debut as a trilogy set on Blu-rayÂ™ October 25, 2011."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000156/","name":"Jeff Goldblum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000592/","name":"Pete Postlethwaite"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0437457/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000341/","name":"Michael Crichton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462895/","name":"David Koepp"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Confessions of a Shopaholic
Wyznania zakupoholiczki
Confessions of a Shopaholic
programme.desc:
Confessions of a Shopaholic: Directed by P.J. Hogan. With Isla Fisher, Hugh Dancy, Krysten Ritter, Joan Cusack. A college grad lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City to support where she nurtures her shopping addiction and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1093908/","name":"Confessions of a Shopaholic","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ1MzcyMTkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM3MTc5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A college grad lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City to support where she nurtures her shopping addiction and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1093908/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"daverolltide"},"dateCreated":"2009-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Funny and timely","reviewBody":""Confessions of a Shopaholic" is a chick flick romcom that you can take your daughter to see. You can take your mother to see it. Heck, you can take grandma. It's rated PG. No f-bombs. No naked people. No gun play.

Isla Fisher plays Rebecca Bloomfield, a journalist with an addiction to shopping. She gets into very deep debt. Kind of like our nation has done recently and is continuing to do. Not that this movie is intended to be any kind of political metaphor. It's just a cute and funny movie which any of us, male or female, can relate to---if we've ever accumulated too big a balance on our credit cards. (I know that I could've used a bailout a few times in my life!)

While the script provides some decent laughs, I loved Isla Fisher's physical comedy. She's good. 

Hugh Dancy as the male lead was okay. But I'll leave the critique of his work to a female poster.

Always fun to see actors and actresses who you like but haven't seen on screen that much lately and "Shopaholic" has a few. Like Julie "Airplane" Hagerty and Wendy "Just Shoot Me/Dream On" Malick. Kristin Scott-Thomas, John Lithgow and, yes, Lynn Redgrave. Not to mention Joan Cusack and John Goodman as Rebecca's mom and dad.

For me, this is way more entertaining than last week's chick flick (the one which I'm just not that into). Even though that one had more star power, this one is the better movie, I think.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76424,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2009-03-18","keywords":"f rated,female journalist,magazine,debt,shopping","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Confessions of a Shopaholic: Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4268949529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ1NTkyNzItODZlZS00ODVkLWIzMzgtOTQ0YTgxZDJjMWY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpybA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ1NTkyNzItODZlZS00ODVkLWIzMzgtOTQ0YTgxZDJjMWY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpybA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the first trailer for Confessions of a Shopaholic, directed by P.J. Hogan and starring Isla Fisher."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0279545/","name":"Isla Fisher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0199215/","name":"Hugh Dancy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1269983/","name":"Krysten Ritter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0389591/","name":"P.J. IMDb data; ttnr: 1093908, Title: Confessions of a Shopaholic, --- Description: Confessions of a Shopaholic: Directed by P.J. Hogan. With Isla Fisher, Hugh Dancy, Krysten Ritter, Joan Cusack. A college grad lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City to support where she nurtures her shopping addiction and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1093908/","name":"Confessions of a Shopaholic","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ1MzcyMTkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM3MTc5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A college grad lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City to support where she nurtures her shopping addiction and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1093908/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"daverolltide","dateCreated":"2009-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Funny and timely","reviewBody":""Confessions of a Shopaholic" is a chick flick romcom that you can take your daughter to see. You can take your mother to see it. Heck, you can take grandma. It's rated PG. No f-bombs. No naked people. No gun play.

Isla Fisher plays Rebecca Bloomfield, a journalist with an addiction to shopping. She gets into very deep debt. Kind of like our nation has done recently and is continuing to do. Not that this movie is intended to be any kind of political metaphor. It's just a cute and funny movie which any of us, male or female, can relate to---if we've ever accumulated too big a balance on our credit cards. (I know that I could've used a bailout a few times in my life!)

While the script provides some decent laughs, I loved Isla Fisher's physical comedy. She's good. 

Hugh Dancy as the male lead was okay. But I'll leave the critique of his work to a female poster.

Always fun to see actors and actresses who you like but haven't seen on screen that much lately and "Shopaholic" has a few. Like Julie "Airplane" Hagerty and Wendy "Just Shoot Me/Dream On" Malick. Kristin Scott-Thomas, John Lithgow and, yes, Lynn Redgrave. Not to mention Joan Cusack and John Goodman as Rebecca's mom and dad.

For me, this is way more entertaining than last week's chick flick (the one which I'm just not that into). Meet the Spartans
programme.desc:
Meet the Spartans: Directed by Jason Friedberg, Aaron Seltzer. With Sean Maguire, Carmen Electra, Ken Davitian, Kevin Sorbo. A spoof of 300 (2006) and many other movies, TV series/shows/commercials, video games and celebrities. King Leonidas of Sparta and his army of 12 go to war against Xerxes of Persia to fight to the death for Sparta's freedom." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1073498/","name":"Meet the Spartans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxMDE3NDQwMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjA0MzU1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A spoof of 300 (2006) and many other movies, TV series/shows/commercials, video games and celebrities. King Leonidas of Sparta and his army of 12 go to war against Xerxes of Persia to fight to the death for Sparta's freedom.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1073498/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pollards11"},"dateCreated":"2008-01-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horrible, I hated it!!!","reviewBody":"This was one of the worst films I can say I have ever seen in my lifetime!!! 

The spoofs were corny and stupid and the movie was like an hour long. 

The movie is like an hour of hell. 

I hope they never make a movie this bad again!!! 

I also would like to see a really good spoof movie in the future... i really enjoyed scary movie 1 and 2. 

One way to solve the problem is to get the Wayans bros. back into spoofing too.

Overall .5 out of 10 (yes .5) 

get ready for a horrible ride of spoofs!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":2.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2008-01-25","keywords":"george w. bush character,donald trump character,rambo character,britney spears character,tom cruise character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Meet the Spartans","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1169293593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwMDY4NDY0OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjUyMDMzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwMDY4NDY0OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjUyMDMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Meet the Spartans Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0536630/","name":"Sean Maguire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001757/","name":"Kevin Sorbo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001182/","name":"Carmen Electra"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0294997/","name":"Jason Friedberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0783536/","name":"Aaron Seltzer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0294997/","name":"Jason Friedberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0783536/","name":"Aaron Seltzer"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kislota
Kwas
Kislota
programme.desc: Kislota: Directed by Aleksandr Gorchilin. With Filipp Avdeev, Aleksandr Kuznetsov, Roza Khayrullina, Elena Morozova. Acid is a silent manifesto of the generation of twenty-year-old. They have been abandoned in a world adorned with concepts such as family, friendship, love, and opportunities. In search of answers to their questions, they devour themselves like a chemical substance that corrodes the world around, in order to eventually learn not to listen but to hear, not to look but to see. And to find their way. Sacha and Petya live the crazy life of young musicians in modern-day Moscow: loud parties, ups and downs, the wheel of unstable relationships with others and themselves. Knowing the importance of love, family, and opportunity, but feeling lonely and disconnected, has left them both with a sense that they are corroding from the inside. Suddenly an event occurs in their lives that requires them both to take an honest look at themselves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8304276/","name":"Kislota","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2QwYjJhNzQtZDUwNC00NWIxLWE2OGMtMzljYzk2Zjc2ODU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzY2NDI0NzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Acid is a silent manifesto of the generation of twenty-year-old. They have been abandoned in a world adorned with concepts such as family, friendship, love, and opportunities. Home
